alert.note: Alert for Frontier; Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:21PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Frontier and southeastern Hayes Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 620 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hayes Center, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hayes Center and Quick. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 32 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Nebraska.
